name: David LEHRMAN, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of February 2014, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
